articles.content: With the FTC's injunction against Microsoft denied, we move one (legally pending) step closer to a reality in which Microsoft takes control of Activision's PS5 player share and claims ownership of Ca… [+3327 chars]

articles.author: Nathan Bliss
articles.title: First EA FC 24 Career Mode features you may have missed including Player and Manager Career - The Mirror
articles.description: EA FC 24 was finally revealed earlier this week, and the first Career Mode features have been unveiled.
articles.content:
The official EA FC 24 reveal focused mainly on gameplay, but there were a few new Career Mode features covered that you may have missed.
